Package index

Functional Interface

tdb_array()
Open TileDBArrayExp
tdb_array_create()
Create a TileDB Array
tdb_group()
Open TileDBGroupExp
tdb_group_create()
Create a TileDB Group
tdb_fragments()
Open TileDBFragments
set_config_params() unset_config_params()
Modify Config Parameters
vfs_dir_tree()
Print Directory Contents
vfs_size()
VFS Directory Size

Open,Close

Open, close methods

open_write(<TileDBArray>) open_write(<tiledb_array>) open_write(<TileDBGroup>) open_write(<tiledb_group>) open_write(<character>)
Open a TileDB Resource at Write Mode
close(<tiledb_array>) close(<TileDBArray>) close(<tiledb_group>) close(<TileDBGroup>)
Close a TileDB Resource

Metadata

Metadata methods

metadata(<TileDBArray>) metadata(<TileDBGroup>) metadata(<tiledb_array>) metadata(<tiledb_group>) metadata(<character>) `metadata<-`(<TileDBArray>) `metadata<-`(<TileDBGroup>) `metadata<-`(<tiledb_array>) `metadata<-`(<tiledb_group>) `metadata<-`(<character>)
Get, Set a TileDB Metadata Key
fetch_metadata(<TileDBArray>) fetch_metadata(<TileDBGroup>) fetch_metadata(<tiledb_array>) fetch_metadata(<tiledb_group>) fetch_metadata(<character>)
Fetch TileDB Metadata
set_metadata(<TileDBArray>) set_metadata(<TileDBGroup>) set_metadata(<tiledb_array>) set_metadata(<tiledb_group>) set_metadata(<character>)
Set TileDB Metadata
delete_metadata(<TileDBArray>) delete_metadata(<TileDBGroup>) delete_metadata(<tiledb_array>) delete_metadata(<tiledb_group>) delete_metadata(<character>)
Delete TileDB Metadata

Timestamps

Helpers to work with timestamps

Set a TileDB timestamp
set_consolidation_timestamps() unset_consolidation_timestamps()
Modify Consolidation Start/End Timestamps

Modify Group Start/End Open Timestamps
array_timestamps(<tiledb_array>) array_timestamps(<TileDBArray>)
Get Array Timestamps
group_timestamps(<tiledb_ctx>) group_timestamps(<tiledb_group>) group_timestamps(<tiledb_config>) group_timestamps(<TileDBGroup>)
Get Group Timestamps
